blueprint_book.label: Requester Stations
blueprint_book.description:
It takes TWO prints to make a station: one "head" and one "body".

DO NOT MERGE CHESTS UNLESS IT IS A "MERGED" STATION!

Merging chests requires mods:
- Merging Chests
- Merging Chests Unlimited

With the following configuration:

- Iron chest merge mode: All (wooden & steel can be "none")
- Maximum chest width: 64 (or higher)
- Maximum chest height: 64 (or higher)
- Whitelist of merged chests: Nx1 1xN   (less memory over NxN)
